name: THE ROBODVENTURE
description:
You wake up in the darkness of a dungeon, but you don't seem to be worried. Why? Because you are a robot and have no emotions... or do you?

  You are greeted by the scientist, your creator and you go through different rooms as he guides you and you quickly adapt. Is this fast learning abilities a curse or a gift?

. . .

This is a work of fiction. All the names, characters, events and incidents in this game are a product of the imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

. . . 

Music was written for this game by my friend: check out his soundcloud

The art, the code, the writing and the sound effects was created by me: check out my itch page or my gamejolt page.

This game was made for the Secret Santa GameJam, my giftee was SlingRah.
